title: Issouf Compaoré
text:
Issouf Compaoré (born 12 April 1988 in <a href="Agnibil%C3%A9krou">Agnibilékrou</a> in <a href="C%C3%B4te%20d%27Ivoire">Côte d'Ivoire</a>) is a <a href="Burkina%20Faso">Burkinabé</a> international <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender playing with <a href="FK%20Banat%20Zrenjanin">FK Banat Zrenjanin</a> in <a href="Serbian%20First%20League">Serbian First League</a>.
Formed at l’Ecole de Formation Yeo Martial (EFYM) in Côte d'Ivoire he played with Ivorian <a href="A.S.C.%20Ouragahio">A.S.C. Ouragahio</a>. He had trials with <a href="Olympique%20de%20Marseille">Olympique de Marseille</a> and short spells with <a href="R.E.%20Virton">R.E. Virton</a> and <a href="FC%20Metz">FC Metz</a> before moving to Serbia in 2008 where after playing initially one season with lower leagues club <a href="FK%20Fru%C5%A1kogorac">FK Fruškogorac</a> he signed with <a href="FK%20Banat%20Zrenjanin">FK Banat Zrenjanin</a>.
He preferably plays as left-back although he can also play as left-winger.
Despite being born in <a href="C%C3%B4te%20d%27Ivoire">Côte d'Ivoire</a> (Ivory Coast) and having made part of the Côte d'Ivoire cadetes national team, he has chousen to represent <a href="Burkina%20Faso%20national%20football%20team">Burkina Faso national team</a> since 2008.
